title: Expressing Your Opinion about a Movie

content.text: In this lesson, you'll learn how to share your opinion about a movie in German. You've just left the cinema with a friend.

data.meaning: How did you find the movie?

content.text: To give your opinion on the movie, you can say 'Ich fand den Film...' followed by an adjective like 'gut' or 'schlecht'.

data.tip: The 'sch' sound is like the 'sh' in 'shoe'. The 'sp' is pronounced 'shp'.

content.title: First Impressions
content.setting: You and your friend Alex have just walked out of the cinema.

conversation_flow.title: State your overall opinion
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Und, wie fandest du den Film?

conversation_flow.title: Comment on the actors
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ja? Ich fand den Film auch gut. Und die Schauspieler?

content.text: Great start! Now let's talk about specific parts of the movie. We'll learn how to agree and disagree.

content.title: Getting into Details
content.setting: You continue your discussion with Alex as you walk.

conversation_flow.title: Mention a part you liked or disliked
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ich fand den Film okay. Das Ende war ein bisschen langweilig.

conversation_flow.title: State if the story was believable
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Interessant. Ich fand die Geschichte nicht sehr glaubwürdig.

conversation_flow.title: Agree or disagree with your friend
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Wirklich? Ich fand die Geschichte gut.

content.text: Let's wrap up the conversation. You'll now learn how to recommend something and make a suggestion for the future.

data.phrase: Ich würde den Film nicht empfehlen
data.meaning: I would not recommend the movie

data.tip: The 'pf' sound is tricky. Try making a 'p' sound and immediately follow it with an 'f' sound.

content.title: Recommendations and Plans
content.setting: You're deciding what to do next.

conversation_flow.title: Say if you'd recommend the movie
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Also, würdest du den Film empfehlen?

conversation_flow.title: Suggest another movie for next time
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Okay. Was wollen wir nächstes Mal sehen?

conversation_flow.title: Suggest getting a drink
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Gute Idee! Ein lustiger Film ist gut.
